tool_description: uNoGS (unofficial Netflix online Global Search) allows anyone to  search the global Netflix catalog.
title: uNoGS

api_list.name: /static/genres
api_list.description: Get Static list of Genres (updated daily)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/static/genres"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of all movie genres available on Netflix?
I want to see the different genres Netflix offers today.
What are the current categories of shows and movies on Netflix?
List all the genres Netflix has in its catalog right now.
Could you provide me with the updated genres list for Netflix content?
Show me the genres that Netflix classifies its titles under as of today.
I need a daily updated list of Netflix genres.
Give me the genres available on Netflix's platform currently.
What genres can I browse on Netflix right now?
Provide the static list of Netflix genres updated for today.

api_list.name: /title/genres
api_list.description: All Genres Associated with a Title

parameters.name: netflix_id
parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/countries
api_list.description: All Country/Language information associated with a Title

parameters.name: netflix_id
parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /search/titles
api_list.description:
Parameter Notes:
new_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.

parameters.name: end_rating
parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

parameters.name: country_list
parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

parameters.name: start_year
parameters.description: year date > 1900

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: name of person in title

parameters.name: end_year
parameters.description: year date > 1900

parameters.name: top250
parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Movies number 0-250

parameters.name: start_rating
parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

constraints.inter-dependency: new_date: can be a single date or two dates separated by a comma

parameters.name: top250tv
parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Series number 0-250

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: search all titles by name

parameters.name: expiring
parameters.description: if 'true' show all titles set to expire

parameters.name: subtitle
parameters.description: name of subtitle language e.g. english

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: movie or series

parameters.name: genre_list
parameters.description: CSV list of genres, see misc/genre endpoint

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: name of audio language e.g english

parameters.name: audio_sub_andor
parameters.description: and=language in bot audio and sub, or=language in either audio or sub

parameters.name: country_andorunique
parameters.description: and=titles in all countries, or=any title in these countries, unique=unique titles in chosen countries

utterances.utterance: Can you find me some interesting titles available on Netflix?
Show me movies with the title 'Inception' that have English audio.
I want to watch series or movies that have either French audio or subtitles.

Are there any titles starring Tom Hanks that are about to expire soon?
Show me the top 50 movies released after 2010.
Find movies released before 2000 with an IMDb rating up to 7.
I want to watch movies with Spanish subtitles available in Mexico and Spain.
Show me titles added to Netflix after March 1st, 2023.

api_list.name: /search/people
api_list.description: Search for people by title name, person name, or netflix_id

parameters.name: netflix_id
parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

parameters.name: person_type
parameters.description: what the person did on the project

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: search all titles by name

utterances.utterance: Can you find information about people involved in any Netflix title?
Show me the cast and crew for the Netflix title with ID 80057281.
I want to look up people related to the movie Inception on Netflix.
Find all directors who worked on Netflix projects.
List all actors involved in the Netflix show with ID 70143836.
Search for people associated with the title Stranger Things.
Get me the producers named John Smith who worked on the Netflix title with ID 60034567.
Who are the people involved in Netflix productions?
Find the crew for the Netflix movie with ID 81234567.
Look up people related to the documentary The Social Dilemma.

api_list.name: /search/deleted
api_list.description:
Search for Deleted Titles by Country or Title Name
delete_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/search/deleted"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: search all titles by name

constraints.inter-dependency: delete_date: can be a single date or two dates separated by a comma to specify a date range

parameters.name: netflix_id
parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

parameters.name: country_list
parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the titles that have been removed from Netflix recently?
I want to find out if the show with Netflix ID 70143836 has been deleted.
List all titles that were deleted after January 1st, 2020.
Are there any deleted titles from Netflix in the US and Canada?
Find deleted titles with the name 'Stranger Things'.
Has the title with Netflix ID 80057281 been deleted since March 15, 2021?
Show me deleted titles named 'The Crown' that were available in the UK and Australia.
Check if the movie with Netflix ID 60034567 was deleted in France and Germany between 2019-01-01 and 2019-12-31.
Are there any deleted titles called 'Black Mirror'?
I want to know if the show with Netflix ID 70143836 named 'Breaking Bad' was deleted in the US or Mexico after 2022-06-01.

api_list.name: /static/countries
api_list.description: Get Static list of Supported Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/static/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the countries where Netflix is available?
I want to know which countries are supported by Netflix for streaming.
List all the nations that have access to Netflix content.
What countries does Netflix support for its global catalog?
Give me a complete list of countries where Netflix operates.
Which countries can I stream Netflix in?
Provide the static list of all Netflix supported countries worldwide.
Tell me the countries included in Netflix's global streaming service.
Show me the countries that are part of Netflix's supported regions.
I need a list of all countries where Netflix content is accessible.
